it.polimi.se2018.model

Class Turn

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.Turn

  • public class Turn
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a turn in the game.
    Author:
    dvdmff

    • Constructor Detail

      • Turn

        public Turn(Player player,
            boolean secondTurnAvailable)
        Creates a Turn object for the given player.

        The newly created turn has, by default, hasAlreadyPlacedDie() and hasAlreadyUsedToolCard() returning false, since the player is supposed not to have done any move yet.

        Parameters:
        player - The player whose turn this is.
        secondTurnAvailable - Flag to indicate if player has a second turn this round.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()
        Getter for the player who can move.
        Returns:
        The player whose turn this is.

      • isSecondTurnAvailable

        public boolean isSecondTurnAvailable()
        Tells if the player has a second turn this round.
        Returns:
        true if the player has a second turn this round; false otherwise.

      • hasAlreadyPlacedDie

        public boolean hasAlreadyPlacedDie()
        Tells if the player has already placed a die this turn.
        Returns:
        true if the player has already placed a die this turn; false otherwise.

      • placeDie

        public void placeDie()
        Updates the object to indicate that the player has placed a die this turn.

      • hasAlreadyUsedToolCard

        public boolean hasAlreadyUsedToolCard()
        Tells if the player has already used a tool card this turn.
        Returns:
        true if the player has already used a tool card this turn; false otherwise.

      • useToolCard

        public void useToolCard()
        Updates the object to indicate that the player has used a tool card this turn.
